title: Map​Frontiers
description: Minecraft mod that allows you to divide the map into regions and assign them names, colors and a banner.
content: This mod is an addon for Journey Map that allows you to divide the map into regions and assign them names, colors and a banner.

title: Auto​Preset​Map
description: Minecraft mod that allows you to automatically change the minimap preset of Journey Map when you change the dimension.
content:
This mod is an addon for Journey Map that changes the minimap preset when you change dimension. It is for the client (Forge or Fabric), it is not needed on the server.
To configure it, use the button to the right on the JourneyMap fullscreen map.

title: P-Changer
description: Free puzzle game created in Haxe.
content: You need to activate adobe flash player to play this game.

title: About me
content:
I am an indie game developer. I like to program in C++, use Godot and I’m developing the mod MapFrontiers for Minecraft (Java Edition).
If you really like what I do, consider becoming a Patron or making a one-time donation :)
